price: 6. Niet één van de steden van degenen die Wij vernietigd hebben, geloofden vóór hen, zullen zij dan geloven?
arabic: مَآ ءَامَنَتۡ قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَآۖ أَفَهُمۡ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: mā āmanat qablahum min qaryatin ahlaknāhā afahum yu'minūna
